analysis.description:
AABitcoinToken._claimTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x4aff03b46792ba7f65403a0d96b2fb8ca8d54367.sol#443-468) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- timer[target] == 0
	- timer[target] == now

AABitcoinToken._claimTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x4aff03b46792ba7f65403a0d96b2fb8ca8d54367.sol#443-468) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- timer[target] == 0
	- timer[target] == now
AABitcoinToken._getPoS (/unique_chucks/2/0x4aff03b46792ba7f65403a0d96b2fb8ca8d54367.sol#470-479) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- TIME == 0

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x4aff03b46792ba7f65403a0d96b2fb8ca8d54367.sol:
	Contract AABitcoinToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x4aff03b46792ba7f65403a0d96b2fb8ca8d54367.sol#429-431)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

AABitcoinToken._claimTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x4aff03b46792ba7f65403a0d96b2fb8ca8d54367.sol#443-468) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_totalSupply.add(totalTkn) (/unique_chucks/2/0x4aff03b46792ba7f65403a0d96b2fb8ca8d54367.sol#460-461)

AABitcoinToken._BLOCKS_PER_READJUSTMENT should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x4aff03b46792ba7f65403a0d96b2fb8ca8d54367.sol#100-102)
AABitcoinToken._MAXIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x4aff03b46792ba7f65403a0d96b2fb8ca8d54367.sol#104)
AABitcoinToken._MINIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x4aff03b46792ba7f65403a0d96b2fb8ca8d54367.sol#102-104)
AABitcoinToken.doubleUnit should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x4aff03b46792ba7f65403a0d96b2fb8ca8d54367.sol#136-137)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/2/0x4aff03b46792ba7f65403a0d96b2fb8ca8d54367.sol#320-321:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
